snippet: William C. Thompson Jr., who was appointed to the Battery Park City Authority in 2010, is stepping down as its chairman.
abstract: William C Thompson Jr is stepping down as chairman of the Battery Park City Authority as he increases his focus on city's 2013 mayoral campaign; Democrat Thompson, a former New York City comptroller, lost the 2009 race to Mayor Michael R Bloomberg.
lead_paragraph: William C. Thompson Jr., who was appointed to the Battery Park City Authority in 2010, is stepping down as its chairman.

headline.seo: Thompson Leaves Battery Park Authority to Focus on Mayoral Run
headline.main: Thompson Quits Authority to Focus on Bid for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Thompson Quits Authority To Focus on Bid for Mayor
